edu.stanford.nlp.io
Class IOUtils

java.lang.Object
  edu.stanford.nlp.io.IOUtils

public class IOUtils
extends Object

Helper Class for storing serialized objects to disk.

Author:
Kayur Patel, Teg Grenager
